Kenzo had seen the part coming (He was outside the base on guard 
duty) and saw it decending from the sky. He to walked to the control 
room and saw Kup and Rodimus "Just incase anyones interested a meteor 
like projectile landed north of your position, it was coming from the 
general direction of the predacon base" he said calmly "So should we 
investigate or just pretend it never happened?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> Nightlight was sleeping when the artifact 1 crashed, she woke up 
and 
> left her quarters; she walked towards the control room, she liked 
to 
> find out what was going there.
> 
> She came in to control room and said "What's going on ??? what was 
> that? " asked to Kup
>  
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > 
> > Rodimus was looking over files in his computer when the room was 
> filled with a flash of light. The Commander turns around in his 
chair 
> to look out the large window. All he could see was the last of what 
> seemd to be a fire trail going down in the hills north of the base.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: What on Cybertron was that?!
> > 
> > Meanwhile in the control room Kup was still at the sensor station 
> when it picked up a signal. It was close and fast. The station 
> started a siren and started to flash alert lights.
> > 
> > Kup had been paying little attention to the screens and the 
alarms 
> and lights caused him to jump, nearly falling out of his chair. He 
> gets back up and tries to ID what the trouble was.
> > 
> > Kup: What in the bloody hell?! If this is the Predacons I'm going 
> to incenerate their hides!
> > 
> > Kup then figured out what had happaned, from the sensor data.
> > 
> > Kup was about to contact Rodimus when the Commander's voice came 
> over the comm system.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Prime to control room, what's goind on? Did you 
pick 
> up that activity outside?
> > 
> > Kup hit a button so he could reply.
> > 
> > Kup: We picked it up alright, Sir. It scared the hell out of me! 
> The sensors read it as some sort of crystalized structure. Want me 
to 
> go check it out?
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Not alone, old timer, I'm coming also. I'll be 
right 
> there.
> > 
> > Kup: Old timer?! Why I oughta... Your getting pretty old yourself 
> Rody...
> > 
> > Kup was cut off as the comm link was closed.
> > 
> > Kup waited for Rodimus to arrive.
> > 
> > Rodimus stepped out of his office and started to walk to the 
> control room.
> >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> >   From: x_rauq_x

> > 
> > 
> >   -- Artifact Piece 1 --
> > 
> >   Near the Maximal base, a flash of light followed by what looked 
> like 
> >   a small fireball decending towards a slightly hilly area north 
of 
> >   the base. It hits the ground with a small crash, not that 
> noteable, 
> >   but it would definately show up on the scanners.
> >
